MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haa...haa...fuu...We've come a long way, haven't we~?

It was a long time before we can escape.
When we're far away from the main street, we finally lose everyone who were chasing them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I feel a bit bad to the town for my sudden disappearance.

If we would have stayed there, more people would have gathered.
Even during a crowded festival that would be a big deal.

By now they should be enjoying the festival as they did earlier.
Ohana, you don't have to worry about them.
When I'm about to say that my stomach suddenly growls.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huhu, you're hungry♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
There is a nice shady spot, so why don't we eat the food we just bought?
Food is best eaten while it is freshly prepared and warm.

Ohana nudges me to sit side by side on a stone in the shade of a tree.
When I open the package I bought, a delicious smell fills the air.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It has been a very long time since I have had a meal prepared by someone else. Bon appétit♪

Let's dig in. Nomnom...I see, this is good.
I'm sure I'll miss it again when I get back to the garrison.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Fufu, I'm so glad you like Nishiki's soba, Conductor♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This soba is made by stir-frying vegetables and meat in oil, and then dipping them in a special sauce made by boiling down the vegetables and meat. It is a staple at Nishiki festivals, and both children and adults love it!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's not that difficult. Shall I make it for dinner sometime?
If you say it's delicious, I'm sure everyone will love it.

Yeah, I look forward to it.
By the way, what is this round thing in the package over here?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's called takoyaki... and it's very tasty, but there's a little trick to eating it without getting burned. Hmm...it still looks a little hot...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fuu, fuu...Let it cool down and...yes, you're good to go now.
Conductor, please open your mouth wide.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Okay, say ahhh~♪

Ahhh, nomnom...Oh, this is going to be something I crave.
In return, here's one for you. Let it cool and then...Okay, Ohana, open your mouth.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahhh~ nyum nyum...gulp. It's very delicious♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's like it has a special taste when you feed it to me, Conductor....
I'm sure I'll be wanting more and more...oh?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Fufu~, Conductor. You have soba sauce all around your mouth! It's a little cute, just like a small child♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Umm, I think I have a handkerchief here...
I'll wipe it off for you now, so please hold still for a moment.
With the handkerchief she has taken out, Ohana gently wipes the area around my mouth. My face is so close to hers that I feel like I'm going to stick to her. And it tickles a little, no, a lot.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hnn...um...ugh, I told you to stay still...don't move so much~!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...What? It's itchy? Fufu, be a good boy...Please hold on a little longer♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Okay, all done. you're clean now~!
Thanks, Ohana. I feel like a really small child and I'm kind of embarrassed.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's okay, I'm supposed to take care of everyone in the SSS.
And of course, that means you, too, Conductor.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And I don't know why, but...I feel so happy when I'm taking care of you, Conductor!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So, please let me continue to take care of you from time to time...just like now♪

Ohana laughs happily and shakes her shoulders.
By the time we finish our late lunch, the sun is slowly beginning to set.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's almost over, isn't it?
I couldn't take much time to show you around the festival...

In the first place, I had intended to come today to see you in action, Ohana.
Just being able to see that was enough.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But ...

Is there anything else that you feel dissatisfied with?
If it's your opinion, as the conductor, I must listen to it carefully.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No, that's not what I meant. I usually try not to say things like this...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Can I be a little selfish today?
Ohana's selfishness is rare. I actually will gladly listen to such things.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...If possible, I'd like to go back and see the festival with you sometime, Conductor. Ohhh...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I shouldn't...No matter how much you said you would listen to me.
I can't monopolize you, Conductor...

That kind of thing would not be selfish.
Of course I'll go back and see it together sometime. I look forward to it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Really? Fufu, I'm glad...That's a promise, okay? Cross my heart and hope to die♪
Ohana raises her pinky finger. As we intertwine our pinkies and promise each other, Ohana shrugs her shoulders with a small smile.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's time to start preparing food.
If someone gets hungry or something, I'd feel sorry for them...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Ohana
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But now, can I stay next to you like this...just a little bit longer?

When I nod, Ohana puts her head on my shoulder.
She's smiling in some kind of embarrassed way as she keeps her body snuggled up against me.

...I wonder if it is because of the beautiful sunset in Nishiki
that her cheeks look awfully reddish and glowing for the past little bit.

The smile Ohana showed that day was a little different from her usual one―
For some reason, she looked incredibly cute.
